Package ai

Class AiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.AiController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InGameInterface
    public class AiController
extends java.lang.Object
implements InGameInterface
    This class is the main class of the AI. It inherits the InGameInterface methods to call different actions on the AI.
    Author:
    fkleinoe

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AiController​(ClientLogic logic, java.lang.String name, BotDifficulty difficulty, GameSettings gameSettings)
      Constructs an instance of the AIController and initializes parameters, sets up Lists.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
